summary: This is an email chain from August 12, 2019, regarding a psychological observation of an inmate (I/M) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York from July 8-10, 2019, where an inmate companion was utilized. The email indicates difficulty opening an attachment and appears to be internal Bureau of Prisons communication about Jeffrey Epstein's status shortly before his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the psychological observation referenced in the email, which occurred from July 8-10, 2019, while he was incarcerated at MCC New York.

events.title: Psychological Observation of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was placed under psychological observation at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York from 6 pm on July 8, 2019, until 9 am on July 10, 2019, with an inmate companion utilized.

events.title: Email Regarding Epstein's Psychological Observation
events.description: An email was sent discussing and forwarding information about the psychological observation of Jeffrey Epstein that occurred in July 2019, noting an issue with opening an attachment.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was under psychological observation at MCC New York from July 8-10, 2019.
An inmate companion was utilized during this observation period.
The document is an email chain dated August 12, 2019, discussing this prior event.
The email indicates technical difficulties in opening an attachment related to the observation.
